channel.title: [PI] Phailz-Redemption [PI]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Phailz Redemption![/size]
[size=14pt]Hello Fellow moparscape players, i decided to finish what i started a while ago. Some Features/Updates are Below!!
Features:
-Added a Fun Pk Arena. -Fixed the log in announcements, and the alert system. (Tutorial) -Fixed prayer draining, and prayer bonuses. Version 1's leeches where better than turmoil, and everything drained VERY quickly. All that has been fixed now. -Various special attack edits, including correct korasi's effect (other than mage hitting), almost every dragon item's special, every godsword, and any bow specials. -Changed the gameframe. (Super quick fix) -Fixed the Auto-Cache Downloader. -Changed prices and made them more suitable to the server. -Fixed herblore up a bit. Some potions didn't give the right bonuses and/or didn't drain right. -Improved combat. Not nearly as many 0's. -Fixed dead locking. -Fixed many items that equipped in the wrong slots. -Changed a couple of commands. (Made them more efficient) -Added the private chat messages not always sending glitch. -Added "Destroying" objects. (Look in config class) -Fixed the Dragon Dagger glitch that helped you hit really high with it's special. -Reworked thieving a slight bit. -Fixed a good amount of dupes. (Thanks to tutorials)[/size] [size=24pt]More updates Coming Soon![/size]

item.title: [PI] Phailz-Redemption [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:3, topic:412415”][quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=513672.msg3729627#msg3729627 date=1314538761]
You might want to fix up your thread. It looks really plain and boring to look at, try centering, using a few colors, don’t make everything so big, maybe get a nice banner…

And you might want to add pictures.
[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Phailz-Redemption [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Phailz Phailz
item.description:
@Phailz wrote:

[size=18pt]Phailz Redemption![/size]

[size=14pt]Hello Fellow moparscape players, i decided to finish what i started a while ago. Some Features/Updates are Below!!

Features:

-Added a Fun Pk Arena.
-Fixed the log in announcements, and the alert system. (Tutorial)
-Fixed prayer draining, and prayer bonuses. Version 1’s leeches where better than turmoil, and everything drained VERY quickly. All that has been fixed now.
-Various special attack edits, including correct korasi’s effect (other than mage hitting), almost every dragon item’s special, every godsword, and any bow specials.
-Changed the gameframe. (Super quick fix)
-Fixed the Auto-Cache Downloader.
-Changed prices and made them more suitable to the server.
-Fixed herblore up a bit. Some potions didn’t give the right bonuses and/or didn’t drain right.
-Improved combat. Not nearly as many 0’s.
-Fixed dead locking.
-Fixed many items that equipped in the wrong slots.
-Changed a couple of commands. (Made them more efficient)
-Added the private chat messages not always sending glitch.
-Added “Destroying” objects. (Look in config class)
-Fixed the Dragon Dagger glitch that helped you hit really high with it’s special.
-Reworked thieving a slight bit.
-Fixed a good amount of dupes. (Thanks to tutorials)[/size]
[size=24pt]More updates Coming Soon![/size]

Read full topic
